verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
What are they asking one another about?
About the Momentous News.
About which they disagree.
Surely, they will know.
Most certainly, they will know.
Did We not make the earth a cradle?
And the mountains pegs?
And created you in pairs?
And made your sleep for rest?
And made the night a cover?
And made the day for livelihood?
And constructed above you seven firmaments?
And placed a blazing lamp?
And sent down from the clouds pouring water?
To produce with it grains and vegetation?
And lush gardens?
The Day of Sorting has been appointed.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يُنْفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: The Day when the Trumpet is blown, and you will come in crowds.
And the sky is opened up, and it becomes gateways.
And the mountains are set in motion, and they become a mirage.
Hell is lying in ambush.
For the oppressors, a destination.
Where they will remain for eons.

verses.verseString: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.verseStringB: They will taste in it neither coolness nor drink.
Except boiling water and freezing hail.
An appropriate punishment.
They were not anticipating any reckoning.
And they denied Our signs with utter denial.
And We have recorded everything in a book.
So taste! We will increase you in nothing but suffering.
But for the righteous, there is triumph.
Gardens and vineyards.
And splendid spouses, well-matched.
And overflowing cups.

verses.verseString: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.verseStringB: They will hear in it neither gossip nor lies.
A reward from your Lord, a calculated reward.

verses.verseString: رَبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.verseStringB: Lord of the heavens and the earth, and whatever is between them—The Most Merciful—they will have no authorization from Him to speak.

verses.verseString: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.verseStringB: On the Day when the Spirit and the angels stand in a row. They will not speak, except those granted permission by the Compassionate and whose words are true.

verses.verseString: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَنْ شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.verseStringB: This is the Day of Reality. So whoever wills, let him take a path back to his Lord.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَنْذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنْظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنْتُ تُرَابًا
verses.verseStringB: We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day when a person will observe what his hands have produced, and the unbeliever will say, “I wish I were dust.”
